meanings.sent1: The untempered child ran wildly through the park.
meanings.sent2: The untempered wind blew the leaves in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The untempered enthusiasm of the puppy was both adorable and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: Her untempered anger was like a storm brewing on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The untempered energy of the concert was infectious.

meanings.sent1: The untempered steel was prone to breaking under pressure.
meanings.sent2: The untempered chocolate was too hard to bite into.
meanings.sent3: The untempered ice cream was like trying to eat a rock.
meanings.sent4: His untempered response left her feeling cold and hurt.
meanings.sent5: The untempered glass shattered into dangerous shards.

meanings.sent1: The untempered clock always showed the wrong time.
meanings.sent2: The untempered recipe resulted in a disastrous meal.
meanings.sent3: The untempered plan fell apart as soon as it began.
meanings.sent4: Her untempered words caused unintended chaos.
